title: [NGMobile][RECO] Establish New Service for Recommendations
description:
Description
Description: To build an effective recommendation engine, it is crucial to establish a comprehensive data context framework. This involves identifying, documenting, integrating, and storing all relevant data sources to ensure that the recommendation algorithms have access to accurate and complete data. This also includes configuring and testing the integration with various APIs. We will ensure that all tasks follow our architectural guidelines for consistency and scalability.
Tasks within this Epic:
AWS Infrastructure
Database
API Integration
Tardis Integration
Configuration Files Structure
Documentation
creating relevant Wiki pages
Testing and Validation
Test Automation
Load test
Outcome: Upon the completion of these tasks, we will be ready to utilize the new service. The service can be managed and further developed by any developer to optimize and enhance the recommendation engine. All tasks will be carried out in accordance with our architectural guidelines to ensure consistency, scalability, and maintainability.
